INSERT INTO dms_tb_cashflow ( CASHFLOW_CID, SHOP_ID, BANK_ACCT_ID, SUMMARY, CR_AMOUNT, DR_AMOUNT, TRADE_DATE, TRADE_NO, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #cashflowCId#, #shopId#, #bankAcctId#, #summary#, #crAmount#, #drAmount#, STR_TO_DATE(#tradeDate#, '%Y-%m-%d %T'), #tradeNo#, 'U', NOW(), #modifyUser#, NOW(), #modifyUser# )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.select:
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(t.cr_amount), 0) AS crAmount, IFNULL(SUM(t.dr_amount), 0) AS drAmount FROM dms_tb_cashflow t, dms_tb_cashflow_cat p WHERE t.cashflow_cid = p.cashflow_cid AND t.state = 'U' AND p.state = 'U' AND t.shop_id = #shopId#
p.cashflow_code = #code#

SELECT t.cashflow_id AS cashflowId, t.bank_acct_id AS bankAcctId, t.summary, t.cr_amount AS crAmount, t.dr_amount AS drAmount, DATE_FORMAT(t.trade_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS tradeDate, t.trade_no AS tradeNo FROM dms_tb_cashflow t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.shop_id = #shopId# ORDER BY $sort$ $order$ LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $offset$
